Fedora Sericea provides the popular Sway: Fedora Sericea provides the popular Sway tiling window manager in an immutable fashion. It makes Sway accessible and appealing to both novices and advanced users who prefer not to use a mouse, touchpad, or other pointing device to interact with their environment. Featuring lightweight applications for web browsing, text editing, and media playback, the Fedora Sericea offers a complete experience with a minimalist user interface.
